scenarios.name: Phishing Email Analyzer
scenarios.description: A multi-agent system processes incoming emails for phishing detection using LLMs and agentic orchestration.

scenarios.name: Autonomous Chatbot in Healthcare
scenarios.description: An LLM-powered agent acts as a virtual assistant for patient triage and information.

scenarios.name: Financial Transaction Monitor
scenarios.description: Agents analyze real-time financial transactions to detect fraud using LLMs.

scenarios.name: GenAI-Powered Document Classifier
scenarios.description: LLM agents classify and label sensitive documents in a corporate environment.

scenarios.name: Customer Service GenAI Bot
scenarios.description: A customer support chatbot for a telecom company that can access sensitive customer data to resolve queries.

scenarios.name: Autonomous Supply Chain Optimizer
scenarios.description: A multi-agent system that uses LLMs to predict and optimize supply chain logistics.

scenarios.name: Autonomous Incident Response Agent
scenarios.description: LLM-driven agent detects, triages, and responds to security incidents in real-time.

scenarios.name: Legal Contract Analyzer
scenarios.description: LLM agents review and flag potential risks or compliance violations in corporate legal contracts.

scenarios.name: Smart IoT Device Manager
scenarios.description: Agents monitor and manage a network of smart IoT devices in a manufacturing plant, responding to anomalies or security threats.

scenarios.name: Automated Recruitment Screener
scenarios.description: GenAI-powered agent screens job applications, schedules interviews, and assists HR in talent acquisition.
